sentences.en: A lot of the clientele, she noted, didn't seem to discriminate between the two.
sentences.cn: 她注意到, 很多诉讼委托人似乎都不区别对待这二者.

sentences.en: According to the salon's manager, Miyuki Gunji, 90 percent of their clientele are hostesses.
sentences.cn: 该沙龙经理称, 他们客户中的90%都是女招待.

sentences.en: All hotels do not serve clientele, that is, the same kind of guests.
sentences.cn: 并不是所有的宾馆都只为一种客人服务.

sentences.en: Modern school mainly contains clientele effect thought, signaling hypothesis and agency cost theory.
sentences.cn: 现代学派主要有追随者效应学派, 信号假说,代理成本理论.

sentences.en: My clientele has always favoured quality rather than quantity.
sentences.cn: 我的老主顾们总是注意质量而不是数量.

sentences.en: Our clientele has always favoured quality rather than quantity.
sentences.cn: 我们的主顾从来都是看重质量胜过数量.

sentences.en: Our restaurant always remains a good reputation - we have a good clientele here.
sentences.cn: 我们餐厅信誉一直很好,同顾客的关系十分融洽.
从你们现有的老顾客做起.

sentences.en: The boutique caters for a rather select clientele.
sentences.cn: 这家精品店为特定的顾客群服务.

sentences.en: The designer changed their color to make them more appealing for the young clientele.
sentences.cn: 设计者改变了课桌的颜色让它们看起来更活泼.

sentences.en: The restaurant attracts a young clientele.
sentences.cn: 这家餐馆吸引年轻顾客。

sentences.en: The restaurant has a large regular clientele.
This is not the type of clientele any restaurant wants to attract.
sentences.cn: 任何餐馆都不想招徕这种类型的顾客.

sentences.en: This pub had a mixed clientele.
sentences.cn: 这家酒吧什么样的客人都有。

sentences.en: To promote and maintain good public relations with hotel clientele.
sentences.cn: 维持及发展与酒店客户的良好公共关系.

sentences.en: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.cn: 我们只接待特定的高端客户。

trans.tran_cn: 诉讼委托人，顾客，客户，被保护者，追随者
trans.tran_en: The clientele of a place or organization are its customers or clients
